title: Game Progress Route
content:
ain all three of the leaders. Now you can invite Halsin to join your party and help you on your quest to get to Moonrise Towers. After this area, return to Druid Grove by using the Waypoints that you have unlocked. The closest will be Emerald Grove Environs and you begin traveling from there to continue your quest with Halsin.

Find entrance to Underdark from Shattered Sanctum Destroy the moonstone protecting the temple Interact with the Restless Myconid and the colony Help the poisoned gnome De
